name: Milestone Interactive
tag_list: video-games, consoles, india, mumbai, jalandahar, bengaluru, new-delhi, kolkata, hyderabad, chennai
overview:
Milestone Interactive Group is a multi-faceted company engaged in marketing & distribution of Interactive game software, game consoles, game peripherals and Information & Communication Technology products. Founded in 1997, the company is headquartered at Mumbai and is the leading Distributor and Publisher for console and PC games in India.

Milestone Interactive Group represents leading global game publishers including Capcom, Electronic Arts (EA), Namco Bandai, Tecmo Koei, Novalogic and Sony Computer Entertainment (SCEE) as well as prominent brands in the ICT space such as; AVG Technologies and Kensington Computer Products Group.

DISTRIBUTION REACH:

The company has a comprehensive distribution reach spanning the entire country with a specific focus on the top 60 cities. Additionally, the company maintains direct sales offices in the Top six cities viz; Mumbai, New Delhi / NCR, Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Chennai and Kolkata.

The company has a multi-tiered channel approach and reaches its consumers through a mix of Resellers, National Chains and Trade accounts covering industry segments like - Hyper markets, Super markets, Consumer Electronics, Mobile Phone, Computer & IT Peripherals, Game, Music, Books, Toys, Gift Stores and Cyber cafes.

The National chains currently covered directly include; Croma, Reliance Digital, eZone, Sony Centre, Sony Exclusive, Sony Digital, Hypercity, More, Big Bazar, Pantaloon, Central, Landmark, Hyper Books, Odyssey, Viveks, Planet M, Music World and The Mobile Store. In all, the company reaches 1450+ stores across its key markets for Gaming hardware, software and accessories.

Game4u.com is part of the Milestone Interactive Group, which was established in 1997. We, Game4u.com are specialist retailers of PC and video games, consoles and related accessories, with customer friendly policies, unrivalled product knowledge, wide range of software and accessories, a credible in-store chart, console value and choice deals, a pre-order program, constant offers and promotions and a Gift coupon program.

Our Vision Game4u is committed to be the leading Indian online retailer of gaming products. Our professional staff will always strive to provide customers with a complete and seamless shopping experience.

Our Mission We aim to provide:

A delightful customer experience Large variety and selection of games and merchandise Quick delivery time-lines Game4u.com prides itself in providing the highest level of customer satisfaction. We take all measures to have your inquiries answered within a few hours and not exceeding 24hrs (except on weekends). Our highly trained staff is happy to answer any questions that you may have. Game4u.com uses its own e-commerce solution which provides ease of use, high security and data protection. Rest assured your information is safe with us.

Our Shipping terms Game4u.com offers shipping only in India as the products on this site are only for sale in the territory of India. As a special offer, all deliveries within India are FREE of CHARGE for a limited period.
